author: Oscar Mireku
title: Implementing SSPR in Entra ID
content: Just shared a detailed breakdown of how I deployed Self-Service Password Reset (SSPR) using Microsoft Entra ID to reduce helpdesk tickets and improve security.

author: Oscar Mireku
title: Hybrid DHCP Deployment
content: Successfully integrated a centralized Windows Server DHCP solution across VMware custom VNets. A great exercise in hybrid networking and OSPF routing.

author: Oscar Mireku
title: Cisco Certified Network Associate
content: Proud to have earned my CCNA! Validating my skills in network fundamentals, IP connectivity, security fundamentals, and automation.
